channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Goodbye pesky cables - Kingston reveals new wire-free portable SSD offering up to 2TB storage and up to 1,050 MB/s data transfers, and it'll fit into even your smallest pocket
item.description: Kingston releases its first cable-free portable SSD offering dual USB connectors, 2TB storage, and high-speed USB 3.2 Gen 2 transfer.

item.title: This laptop is powered by a processor that was discontinued when Obama was president, but for $49, you can use it as a doorstop in a pinch
item.description: The Dell Chromebook 3120 is barely recommendable, but for just $49, I'm sure you can find something useful for it to do.

item.title: Windows 1.0 released 40 years ago today - and started Microsoft's road to success
item.description: Windows 1.0 didn't exactly blow the industry away, but it laid the groundwork for Microsoft's future success.

item.title: Source: Kalshi’s valuation jumps to $11B after raising massive $1B round
item.description: The quickly growing prediction betting market raised fresh capital from Sequoia and CapitalG, according to someone familiar with the deal.

item.title: Even Realities Even G2 Review: Anti-Meta Smart Glasses With Real Potential
item.description: The Even G2 and the Even R1 smart ring feel like a solid stab at smart glasses, but they have a lot to figure out before they justify a hefty price tag.

item.title: Russian Volcano Keeps Spilling Lava Months After Waking From a 500-Year Nap
item.description: A NASA satellite recently captured a volcanic plume billowing from Krasheninnikova.

item.title: Google's upgraded Nano Banana Pro AI image model hailed as 'absolutely bonkers' for enterprises and users
item.description: Infographics rendered without a single spelling error. Complex diagrams one-shotted from paragraph prompts. Logos restored from fragments. And visual outputs so sharp with so much text density and accuracy, one developer simply called it “absolutely bonkers.”Google DeepMind’s newly released Nano Banana Pro—officially Gemini 3 Pro Image—has drawn astonishment from both the developer community and enterprise AI engineers. But behind the viral praise lies something more transformative: a model built not just to impress, but to integrate deeply across Google’s AI stack—from Gemini API and Vertex A...

item.title: It’s actually happened – Android now works with Apple AirDrop for simple file-sharing, starting with the Pixel 10
item.description: Google has announced that Android's Quick Share now works with Apple's AirDrop for quick file-sharing, starting with the Pixel 10 –here's how it works.

item.title: Linux Creator Linus Torvalds Is Sort of Okay With Vibe Coding, Actually
item.description: "Vibe coding may be a horrible, horrible idea from a maintenance standpoint, if you actually tried to make a product," Torvalds said.

item.title: Got a Pixel 10? Google's Android Phone Can Now Share Files With Apple's AirDrop
item.description: You can now share deets (and other digital treats) across the mobile divide.

item.title: Wireless Earbuds Are Going Off the Rails Thanks to AI
item.description: Surprise, surprise, AI is getting smashed together with wireless earbuds in a big way.

item.title: Rian Johnson Explains Why a Muppets ‘Knives Out’ Crossover Wouldn’t Work
item.description: The 'Last Jedi' director has spent the week tempering expectations about an unlikely 'Knives Out' crossover—but says he's down to make his own 'Muppet' movie beyond that.

item.title: The 27 Best Movies on Apple TV, WIRED’s Picks (November 2025)
item.description: Come See Me in the Good Light, Highest 2 Lowest, and The Lost Bus are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV this month.

item.description: Two of our most popular plans, but which is the better value?

item.title: OpenAI is launching group chats in ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI is widely rolling out group chats inside ChatGPT, allowing you to invite up to 20 other people to your conversation with the AI chatbot. The feature is now available globally to all logged-in users, following a short pilot earlier this month. OpenAI positions the feature as a way to collaborate with friends, family members, […]

item.title: Did you know Apple launched a new product today? Get the Hikawa Phone Grip.
item.description: Apple partners with viral phone case designer Bailey Hikawa to launch an accessible phone grip.

item.title: Black Friday soundbar deals are here – save up to 44% on models from Sonos, Sony, LG and more
item.description: Black Friday deals have started, and there are great savings on a range of terrific soundbars, including record-low prices on Dolby Atmos models.

item.title: Feds charge four with illegally smuggling Nvidia AI chips to China
item.description: Federal prosecutors have charged four people with illegally smuggling Nvidia GPUs and HP supercomputers with Nvidia GPUs from the US to China, according to a court filing spotted by Court Watch. The US government has placed restrictions that prevent Nvidia from selling its most powerful chips for AI training to China, but Chinese companies like […]

item.title: Tesla is getting better about reporting FSD crash data — but the numbers are still misleading
item.description: Last week, Tesla revealed a new section of its website dedicated to reporting safety statistics for its advanced driver assist systems, Autopilot and Full Self-Driving (FSD). The new hub appears to be an attempt to move beyond the company's traditional quarterly safety reports, which have been criticized for failing to account for basic facts about […]...

item.title: I cant believe how cheap the basic Kindle is. Grab it for just $79.99 from Amazons Black Friday sale.
item.description: The basic Kindle is already an extremely affordable e-reader but ahead of Black Friday it's even more affordable. Grab it now for just $79.99 at Amazon.

item.title: 65+ early Black Friday deals: Score huge discounts on MacBooks, Kindles, Bose headphones, and Ninja appliances
item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: Don’t be a sucker this Black Friday – this compact robot vacuum’s down to its lowest price yet
item.description: Thanks to Black Friday, the SwitchBot K11+ is heavily discounted, so you should zoom it into your cart right now.

item.title: Gemini 3 is almost as good as Google says it is
item.description: Google set the bar high for Gemini 3. It's promising a bunch of upgraded features in its shiny new AI model, from generating code that produces interactive 3D visualizations to "agentic" capabilities that complete tasks. But as we've seen in the past, what's advertised doesn't always match up to reality. So we put some of […]

item.title: The best early Black Friday book deals to add to your cart
item.description: Shop the best early Black Friday book deals, including a buy one, get one 50% off sale at Amazon.

item.title: Quick Share devient compatible AirDrop : Google brise la frontière avec l’iPhone
item.description: C'est peut-être la plus grosse nouvelle tech de l'année pour l'interopérabilité. Après avoir plié sur le RCS, l'écosystème mobile s'ouvre encore un peu plus. Google lance l'interconnexion native entre Quick Share et AirDrop sur la série Pixel 10.

item.title: Coup de frais pour les consoles portables Windows : le mode plein écran Xbox arrive pour tout le monde
item.description: La gamme ROG Xbox Ally ne sera pas la seule à profiter de la nouvelle « expérience plein écran » de Xbox. Depuis aujourd'hui, Microsoft la met à disposition de toutes les consoles portables sous Windows.

item.title: The music industry is all in on AI
item.description: Two years ago, "BBL Drizzy" was the AI music shot heard around the world: a song with vocals that sounded like Drake bubbled up from nowhere and launched what was shaping up to be a battle of artistry, likeness, and of course, copyright. The big three labels - Universal Music Group (UMG), Sony Music Entertainment, […]

item.title: Salesforce says some of its customers’ data was accessed after Gainsight breach
item.description: Salesforce said it’s investigating an incident where hackers compromised some of its customers' data after breaching customer experience company Gainsight.

item.title: ChatGPT launches group chats globally
item.description: The company sees group chats in ChatGPT as a way for people to coordinate trips, co-write documents, settle debates, or work through research together, while ChatGPT helps search, summarize, and compare options.

item.title: My favorite iPad deal is back for Black Friday – get the iPad Mini for just $399
item.description: I'm back once again asking you to grab this excellent iPad mini deal in Amazon's Black Friday sale.

item.title: Grok Says Elon Musk Is Smarter Than Einstein and More Fit Than LeBron James
item.description: While Musk wants you to trust Grok to organize all of human civilization's knowledge, the bot's fealty to Dear Leader is out of control.

item.title: Théia : l’ancêtre de la Lune serait née près du Soleil !
item.description: Née d’une collision cataclysmique entre la Terre et une planète aujourd’hui disparue, la Lune garde en elle la trace de cette rencontre fondatrice. Mais d’où venait réellement Théia, cet impacteur fantôme ? Une nouvelle analyse isotopique des roches terrestres et lunaires relance l’enquête :...

item.title: How the Mask Made Adam Driver Take on Kylo Ren (Exclusive)
item.description: 10 years after the 'Star Wars' sequel trilogy began in 'The Force Awakens', Adam Driver looks back in a special excerpt from a special anniversary issue of 'Star Wars Insider'.

item.title: We Finally Know the Birthplace of the Mars-Sized Rock That Spawned Our Moon
item.description: Earth and the planetary object that gave rise to the Moon were likely born in the same region of the solar system.

item.title: T-Mobile's Black Friday iPhone 17 deal gets you four devices for free, but I'd buy this one deal instead
item.description: What's better than four free iPhone 17 for Black Friday? Well, T-Mobile may have a slightly better Black Friday deal for you.

item.title: 5 fun ways to use ChatGPT from quizzes to an AI-powered DJ
item.description: Whenever you need a source of entertainment, ChatGPT can create quizzes, personalised crosswords, text-based games, and more

item.title: FICO and Plaid launch a new credit score powered by real-time cash-flow data
item.description: The updated UltraFICO Score blends traditional credit information with Plaid’s transaction-level data from 12,000+ institutions to give lenders a fuller financial picture. For consumers heavy on savings and light on credit history, a new partnership in the world of credit scores could help you lock down a loan. FICO, the company basically synonymous with the credit score, is teaming up with Plaid to bring real-time data showing how much cash you have on hand to lenders....

item.title: Why these founders ditched social ads for Taylor Swift concerts and prison tablets
item.description: Two founders share their stories on how they approached two very different markets: teens in need of well-being advice, and formerly incarcerated individuals looking for work.

item.title: Everything to know about Black Friday 2025: Best early deals, sale dates, price matching, and more
item.description: Black Friday 2025 is well underway, so get up to speed on where to find the best early deals, when the big sales start and end, and price-matching details.

item.title: Mixup is a new, Mad Libs-style app for creating AI images from photos, text, and doodles
item.description: The new app lets anyone use Google's Nano Banana in a fun new way, with fill-in-the-blank AI "recipes" that users can share.

item.title: OnlyFans to require criminal background checks through controversial screener
item.description: New U.S. OnlyFans creators will need to go through a criminal background check through Checkr, which has been named in dozens of lawsuits.

item.title: Windows handhelds are getting the new Xbox Full Screen Experience tomorrow
item.description: Microsoft will start rolling out its new Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) to Windows-based handhelds on November 21st. The full screen mode for the Xbox app originally shipped on the Xbox Ally devices last month, providing a more console-like navigation experience on top of Windows 11. While Microsoft released a preview to MSI Claw models […]

item.title: Black Friday 2025 boycotts: ‘Mass Blackout’ and ‘We Ain’t Buying It’ protests will target Trump and billionaires. Here’s what to know
item.description: Grassroots movements are urging Americans to refuse to shop or even work this Thanksgiving, to send a message about the widening wealth gap. In our consumer driven culture, when the cost of goods is soaring, one of the most radical things you can do is not to buy anything over Black Friday. That’s the message from “Mass Blackout,” a coalition of grassroots groups that are protesting the Trump administration’s policies and urging you not to participate in this year’s extended Black Friday sales....

item.title: Amazon fends off greenwashing lawsuit after SCOTUS refuses to hear case
item.description: The case sought to clarify whether Section 230 shielded Amazon's revenue-generating recommendation algorithm.
